body:
Job Responsibilities:
1.Prepare technical service solutions and strategies for core network implementation.
2.Provide network design, commissioning, integration, acceptance and migration technical service for core network products and solutions.
3.Handle the core network technical problems reported by customers or other support organizations.
4.Deliver validation testing for core network products, functions and features by collaborating with customer and R&D.
General Requirements:
1.Demand an academic degree minimum on bachelor degree in telecommunications, information technology, information engineering, computer science, applied electronics, automatic control and other relevant area.
2.Require more than 2 years experience in telecommunication, information technology, or other relevant area.
3.Need good communication and presentation skills in English language.
4.Need excellent teamwork abilities and interpersonal skills.
5.Need adaptability for participating projects aboard.
Professional Requirements:
1.Understand any of the telecommunication fundaments and principles: Circuit Switching, Packet Switching
2.Familiar with core network operation and maintenance on: IMS, MSC, MGW, HLR, VLR, SGSN, GGSN.
3.Know basic transmission technologies of PDH, SDH, ATM, TCP/IP.
4.Have experience on core network implementation or testing. (Optional)
title: Global Technical Service Engineer-Core Network
